contest-event.event-date:
May 31, 2015 D Luzerner Kantonal-Musikfest (First Section)
Luzerner Kantonal-Musikfest (First Section) 10 Set Test and Own Choice Luzerner Kantonal-Musikfest luzerner-kantonal-musikfest
Vertex Montis
Festhalle Seepark, Sempach, LU, Switzerland Set Work is a revised Version from EBBC 2011 Montreux B-Section, for this Lucerne Area.
Contest held in 2 Blocks D (morning session) and E (afternoon). Jury Set Work: Crausaz, Jeanbourquin, Gray / Jury Own Choice: Lagger, Rüedi, Sagnol
also played Own Choices: Les Gursks, The Dawning, The Year of the Dragon
Oct. 1, 2012, 4:18 p.m. April 11, 2016, 3:26 p.m.
1 Brass Band Kirchenmusik Flühli Armin Renggli Journey to the Centre of the Earth
2 Brass Band MG Reiden Roland Fröscher Journey to the Centre of the Earth
3 Brass Band MG Rickenbach Corsin Tuor Of Men and Mountains
4 Brass Band Emmental Heinz Heiniger Journey to the Centre of the Earth
5 Brass Band Harmonie Neuenkirch Christoph Bangerter
6 Feldmusik Knutwil Gian Stecher Chivalry
7 Musikgesellschaft Brass Band Ermensee Alex Elmiger
8 Brass Band Schötz Peter Stadelmann Chivalry
9 BB Frohsinn Grosswangen Jonathan Kowszun
